colon.description: Used with the 'label' attribute to indicate whether a colon after 'label' is displayed
colon.description_zh: 配合 `label` 属性使用，表示是否显示 `label` 后面的冒号

:extra.description: An additional tooltip, similar to 'help', can be used when you need both an error message and a tooltip.
:extra.description_zh: 额外的提示信息，和 `help` 类似，当需要错误信息和提示文案同时出现时，可以使用这个。

:getValueFromEvent.description: Sets how the value of the event is converted to a field value
:getValueFromEvent.description_zh: 设置如何将 event 的值转换成字段值

:getValueProps.description: Add additional attributes to child elements (not recommended to generate dynamic function prop through `getValueProps`, please pass it directly to child components)
:getValueProps.description_zh: 为子元素添加额外的属性 (不建议通过 `getValueProps` 生成动态函数 prop，请直接将其传递给子组件)

:hasFeedback.description: It is recommended to use it with the 'validateStatus' property to display the verification status icon, which is recommended to be used only with the Input component. In addition, it can also get feedback icons through the Icons property.
:hasFeedback.description_zh: 配合 `validateStatus` 属性使用，展示校验状态图标，建议只配合 Input 组件使用 此外，它还可以通过 Icons 属性获取反馈图标。

help.description: If the prompt message is not set, it will be automatically generated based on the verification rules
help.description_zh: 提示信息，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

hidden.description: Whether to hide the field (the field will still be collected and verified)
hidden.description_zh: 是否隐藏字段（依然会收集和校验字段）

htmlFor.description: Set the child element label 'htmlFor' attribute
htmlFor.description_zh: 设置子元素 label `htmlFor` 属性

initialValue.description: Set the default values for child elements, if it conflicts with Form's 'initialValues', the Form will prevail
initialValue.description_zh: 设置子元素默认值，如果与 Form 的 `initialValues` 冲突则以 Form 为准

:label.description: The text of the label label. When you don't need a label but need to align with colons, you can set it to null
:label.description_zh: `label` 标签的文本，当不需要 label 又需要与冒号对齐，可以设为 null

:labelCol.description: label layout, with the '<Col>' component, set the 'span' 'offset' value, such as '{span: 3, offset: 12}' or 'sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}'. You can use the form's 'labelCol' to do the same thing, and it won't work on nested items. When set at the same time as Form, the Item shall prevail
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span` `offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`。你可以通过 Form 的 `labelCol` 进行统一设置，不会作用于嵌套 Item。当和 Form 同时设置时，以 Item 为准

:messageVariables.description: Information for the default validation field

:normalize.description: The component takes the value, converts it, and puts it into the Form. Asynchronous is not supported
:normalize.description_zh: 组件获取值后进行转换，再放入 Form 中。不支持异步

noStyle.description: 'true' is not styled and is used as a pure field control. When there is no 'validateStatus' itself and the parent element has a Form.Item with 'validateStatus', it will inherit the parent element's 'validateStatus'
noStyle.description_zh: 为 `true` 时不带样式，作为纯字段控件使用。当自身没有 `validateStatus` 而父元素存在有 `validateStatus` 的 Form.Item 会继承父元素的 `validateStatus`

preserve.description: When a field is deleted, the field value is retained
preserve.description_zh: 当字段被删除时保留字段值

required.description: Required style settings. If this parameter is not set, it is automatically generated based on the validation rules
required.description_zh: 必填样式设置。如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

:rules.description: Validation rules: Set the validation logic of the field
:rules.description_zh: 校验规则，设置字段的校验逻辑

trigger.description: Set when changes to field values are collected
trigger.description_zh: 设置收集字段值变更的时机

validateFirst.description: When a rule fails to be verified, whether to stop the verification of the remaining rules. When 'parallel' is set, it is checked in parallel
validateFirst.description_zh: 当某一规则校验不通过时，是否停止剩下的规则的校验。设置 `parallel` 时会并行校验

:validateDebounce.description: Set debounce to validate after specified delay in milliseconds
:validateDebounce.description_zh: 设置防抖，延迟毫秒数后进行校验

validateStatus.description: If the verification status is not set, it will be automatically generated according to the verification rules, optional: 'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'
validateStatus.description_zh: 校验状态，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成，可选：'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'

validateTrigger.description: Set the timing of field validation

valuePropName.description: The property for the value of the child node. Note that the valuePropName for Switch and Checkbox should be 'checked', otherwise you won't be able to get the values of these two components. This property is an encapsulation of 'getValueProps' and will be invalid when you customize 'getValueProps'
valuePropName.description_zh: 子节点的值的属性。注意：Switch、Checkbox 的 valuePropName 应该是 `checked`，否则无法获取这个两个组件的值。该属性为 `getValueProps` 的封装，自定义 `getValueProps` 后会失效

:wrapperCol.description: This property is used when you need to style the layout for an input control, using the same usage as 'labelCol'. You can use the 'wrapperCol' of the Form to set it uniformly, and it will not be applied to nested items. When set at the same time as Form, the Item shall prevail
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 `labelCol`。你可以通过 Form 的 `wrapperCol` 进行统一设置，不会作用于嵌套 Item。当和 Form 同时设置时，以 Item 为准

rootClassName.description: Add className to the outermost layer of component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

Rule.name: enum
Rule.description: Validate from a list of possible values

Rule.name: len
Rule.description_zh: 字符串长度/数值精确匹配

Rule.name: max
Rule.description: Max string length / Number maximum value
Rule.description_zh: 字符串最大长度/数值最大值

Rule.name: message
Rule.description: Error message, will work with the validateMessages from Form config
Rule.description_zh: 错误信息，与 Form 的 validateMessages 配合使用

Rule.name: min
Rule.description: Min string length / Number minimum value
Rule.description_zh: 字符串最小长度/数值最小值

Rule.name: warningOnly
Rule.description: Only warning, not block form submit
Rule.description_zh: 仅警告，不阻塞表单提交

Rule.name: whitespace
Rule.description: Treat whitespace as an error when type is string
Rule.description_zh: 当 type 为 string 时，空格是否会被视为错误
